messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All personal caught BREAKING RANDOM SHIT for no reseason will be sent to manditory fat camp under the authority of the labor camp teleproter

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning Level-7 Biohazard detected on station! All crew are required to assist in dealing with this threat.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Biohazard growth has reached 50%, Eliminate it NOW!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Biohazard mass is at 75% you're loosing your window of oppertunity

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.
